reviewText:
It came in the mail from Kiev Ukraine within 2 weeks.  My granddaughter and grandson love these episodes.
My mother, who grew up in the Ukraine really enjoyed it as well (she can understand what is being said)
You don't have to understand the language to enjoy and relate to this movie.
Very funny cartoon . My kids love it . Its one of Their favorite cartoons . It's so easy to understand for them ..
I just love these little cartoons, the graphics are wonderful and the little girl and bear are adorable!  My grandchildren just love these cartoons.....they are so well done!
